document_data.name: ''The High History of Impiltur''
document_data.author: [[Amphyr|Amphyr the Venerable]]
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/277/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Soargar's Legacy|86}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''The High History of Impiltur''''' was a history [[book]] penned by [[Amphyr|Amphyr the Venerable]] that chronicled the history of the nation of [[Impiltur]] up to its publication date, the {{YearlinkName|1170}}.
document_data.Contents: Among the contents of ''The High History of Impiltur'' was a recount of how [[Ilmara]], sister of King [[Imbrar]], had taken [[elf|elven]] scrying stones from the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] and through them learned that the [[hobgoblin]]s of the [[Giantspire Mountains]] were rebuilding their forces. An act which sent Imbrar to launch an assault on them with his Royal Guard and a host of armsmen, only to never be seen again.
